input.sentences: [female] and her friend at a big meal before the race .
the cyclists all gathered at the start line .
the bikes raced down the road .
afterwards | she and her friends posed by the sign . they did it !
output.sentences: We are getting fueled up before our big bike ride!
Now were getting the bikes all set to go!
And, we're off and riding on what started out as a gloomy day.
The sun eventually came out and we had a beautiful day for the ride.
We are all smiles after the ride and we feel really great about the money earned for lung research.
